name: XtraNet Tech
description: “XtraNet Technologies Pvt. Ltd.” is a Company incorporated under the Companies Act, 1956 with the Registrar of Companies, Madhya Pradesh & Chhattisgarh in the month of January 2002. XtraNet is ISO 9001:2008 Certified IT Company, originated and managed by a consortium of vibrant IT Professionals to provide Integrated IT Solutions to Government, Semi Government organizations as well as Private sectors.

locations.address: Plot No. 22, Zone-1, Maharana Pratap Nagar
